title: Scripter in ranked draft
body: How do I report a scripter? I filed a bug and have a screenshot. He was setting it up in our chat (in golden italics). I dodged because of that.

replies.body: was he on your team? if so he probably used the /me thing

Your best bet for reporting other players for scripting would be to use the after match lobby reporting feature. If something happens that makes you unable to use that report button after the match, you can hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with that info and we can take a look into it!
